comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Lieutenant General Sir Frederick Charles Shaw KCB, PC (1861–1942) was a British Army general who served in the Boer War and the First World War. He became Commander-in-Chief, Ireland and retired in 1920." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_Shaw_(British_Army_officer)

comment._content: Thanks Artolog for the information.  We will update the record.
